profile:
Reynolds Brothers Exteriors – Gutters like no other! Offering eavestroughs/siding/downpipes, soffit/fascia, leaf gutter guard, and windows/doors. 

Reynolds Brothers is a family-run business whose main focus is our commitment to honesty, quality, and customer service. Eavestroughs & Exteriors are often the last thing people think about but are your home's first line of defense against nature's elements.  Our first-class workmanship combined with the most unique and durable options will protect your home for decades to come. Take a look, you’ll be impressed! We offer 4 different styles of eavestrough which really stands out from other companies. 

#1 in Customer Service - Our family-run operation is a Homestars Best of 2017 Award Winner and takes pride in our customer service. You can take comfort in knowing that only our professionally trained staff will visit your home to ensure that you get the quality that you deserve. You can be sure that your experience with Reynolds Bros. will be a positive one. From your first contact, through to work completion and inspection, we are very careful to treat both our clients and their beautiful homes with utmost care and respect. We treat you like Family!

Check out our recent Homestars featured article with Ryan from Reynolds Brothers. 
  
http://blog.homestars.com/archives/top-10-gutter-and-eavestrough-questions/
https://www.readersdigest.ca/home-garden/home-improvement/winter-proof-your-house/

profile: With offices in Barrie and Newmarket, T. Simpson Roofing is a family-owned and -operated company with over 25 years of experience. Our extensive roofing knowledge, combined with honest customer service interactions, has solidified our position among the best roofing companies in the industry. Our commitment to delivering top-quality work, using only the finest materials, has also secured our status as Master Elite™ Contractors—an exclusive industry designation held by only 3% of North American roofing contractors. Contact us today to schedule your appointment.
